page.title: 07NEW HOUSES OLD HOUSES
page.content: My semi detached house,built in 1933, is due for modernisation soon,which will include central heating.My family have lived there for 15 years.The accommodation consists of 3 bedrooms, kitchen,bathroom,toilet,lounge and dining room.There is no garage but we have front and back gardens.My semi- detached house was built in 1971 by Fairview Homes.It was bought brand new in 1972, and has 3 bedrooms,bathroom, toilet,kitchen,dining room and lounge. The 1981 extension included a garage, study and second toilet.We have oil central heating.There are 10 or 12 similar houses nearby.New houses are being built in the village,mainly by Wimpeys.The flat roofed Crittall built houses are still occupied providing an interesting architectural appearance which is maintained by the local Council's strict conservation rules.
